message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in!
Alice, I appreciate the offer but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to offer you $10000 for it. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go below my initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $11000. Let me know if this is more in line with what you're looking for!
